info.title: HybridNetworkManagementClient
info.description: The resources in this swagger specification will be used by publishers to on-board offerings and manage network functions.

get.description: Lists all the publishers in a subscription.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns a list of publisher resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the publishers in a resource group.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns a list of publisher resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

202.description: Accepted. Sets provisioningState to 'Deleting' until the operation is completed. Returns an operation URI that can be queried to find the current state of the operation.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

204.description: Request is successful. Resource does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about the specified publisher.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting publisher resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create publisher operation.

200.description: Create or update operation has been completed successfully. The operation returns the resulting publisher resource.

201.description: Create or update operation has been completed successfully. The header contains 'Azure-AsyncOperation' header pointing to an operations resource. The operation URI can be queried to find the current state of the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create publisher operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information of the ArtifactStores under publisher.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting ArtifactStoreVersion resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

202.description: Accepted. Sets provisioningState to 'Deleting' until the operation is completed. Returns an operation URI that can be queried to find the current state of the operation.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

204.description: Request is successful. Resource does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a artifact store.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update application group operation.

200.description: Create or update operation has been completed successfully. The operation returns the resulting ArtifactStore sub resource.

201.description: Create or update operation has been completed successfully. The operation returns the resulting ArtifactStore sub resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about the specified artifact store.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting ArtifactStore resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update application group operation.

200.description: Creation or update is successful. The operation returns the resulting ArtifactStore sub resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Add network fabric controllers to artifact stores

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update application group operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about the artifact manifest.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting ArtifactManifest resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Create or update operation has been completed successfully. The operation returns the resulting ArtifactManifest sub resource.

201.description: Create or update operation has been completed successfully. The operation returns the resulting ArtifactManifest sub resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: List credential for publishing artifacts defined in artifact manifest.

200.description: Request is successful. The operations returns the credential for publishing artifacts.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update the state of artifact manifest.

200.description: Request is successful. The operations returns the credential for publishing artifacts.

202.description: Request of updating artifact manifest state is accepted.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

identity.description: The managed identity of the publisher, if configured.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the ArtifactManifest resource.

ArtifactManifestUpdateState.description: The artifact manifest updating request payload. Only the 'Uploaded' state is allowed for updates. Other states are used for internal state transitioning.
